input_text:
Job Title: UX Design Operations Manager

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Our mission

At Included Health, we’re on a mission to raise the standard of healthcare for everyone. We’re a new kind of healthcare company, focused on breaking down barriers to provide high-quality care for every person in every community — no matter where they are in their health journey or what type of care they need. We offer guidance, advocacy, and access to personalized care for urgent care, primary care, behavioral health, and specialty care. We’re especially focused on increasing access to high-quality and culturally competent providers.

Our team

We’re a tight-knit, collaborative team of UX Product Designers, Writers, and Researchers, working in close partnership with our Product Management and Engineering teams. We’re driven to improve the health and lives for our members, and transform the confusing and archaic health system. We are passionate advocates for all of our members.

You!

At Included Health we truly believe in creating the best member experience, breaking away from traditional healthcare norms. In order to ensure that our UX Product Designers, Writers, and Researchers can do their best work, we are looking for a self-starting, highly motivated UX Design Operations Manager. You will be an operations “team of one” but an absolutely critical part of our overall team.

What You Will Be Doing

Work closely with the UX leadership (VP, directors, and managers) to continually seek ways to amplify the efforts of their teamsManage UX team needs with respect to documentation, asset and file management, communication and coordination, particularly in light of a distributed, yet collaborative, workforceImplement processes that ensure effective collaboration between our team and their cross functional partners (such as the design/developer hand-off or sharing assets between design and marketing)Play a critical role in implementing our new design & content system and ensuring adoption by designers, writers, PM’s and engineersSpearhead our design quality effort: coordinating design & content QA checkpoints and other reviews to ensure that work meets certain standards before launchManage design and research tool accounts (e.g. team access, communication with vendors, subscription renewals)Support team members with research participant management (recruiting, screening, coordinating, incentive distribution)Maintain internal research panel management tools based on ongoing research activitiesCoordinate with Sales and Marketing to manage demo requestsOwn relationships with internal operations teams such as Finance, Legal, and ProcurementManage external relationships, such as those with contractors, consultants, and vendors

Our Desired Profile

Demonstrated experience in Design Operations and Program ManagementPassionate advocate of putting our members (who aren’t necessarily the same as our payingcustomers) at the heart of the workDeep understanding of user-centered and human-centered design processes, including user research, insights and analysis, prototyping and validation, and delivery of production-ready designStories of how your work in Design Operations enabled a team to scale while maintaining quality and team healthStrong written and oral communication skillsOrderly and organized, able to manage and make sense of inbound requestsDiplomatic demeanor, successfully engaging peers and stakeholders, steering them towards understanding what the UX team needs to succeed

About Included Health

Included Health is a new kind of healthcare company, delivering integrated virtual care and navigation. We’re on a mission to raise the standard of healthcare for everyone. We break down barriers to provide high-quality care for every person in every community — no matter where they are in their health journey or what type of care they need, from acute to chronic, behavioral to physical. We offer our members care guidance, advocacy, and access to personalized virtual and in-person care for everyday and urgent care, primary care, behavioral health, and specialty care. It’s all included. Learn more at includedhealth.com. 

Included Health is an Equal Opportunity Employer and considers applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, orientation, national origin, age, disability, genetics or any other basis forbidden under federal, state, or local law. Included Health considers all qualified applicants in accordance with the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.summary: Included Health is seeking a UX Design Operations Manager to support their UX team in improving the health and lives of their members.

Deep understanding of user-centered and human-centered design processes
Strong written and oral communication skills

Manage team needs related to documentation, asset and file management, communication, and coordination
Implement processes for effective collaboration between teams
Lead implementation of design and content systems
Coordinate design and research QA checkpoints
Manage design and research tool accounts
Support team members with research participant management
Maintain internal research panel management tools
Coordinate with Sales and Marketing for demo requests
Manage relationships with internal operations teams
Manage external relationships with contractors, consultants, and vendors
